hero.title: Fast-track your way into programming
hero.subtitle: Learn to code in 4 weeks with live classes and intensive practice

about.title: 📌 About the Bootcamp
about.description: CodeYourWay Ignite Express is an intensive live course for those who want to enter the programming world in an accelerated way. Our focus is on practical skills, with dynamic classes and real exercises from day one.

warmup.title: 📌 Warm-up (April 2025):
items: Introductory recorded classes
Access to exclusive community
Study materials for familiarization

classes.title: 📌 Start of Live Classes (May 2025):
items: Classes 2x per week (3h each)
Practical projects in each module
Live mentoring sessions
Extra review classes

hours.title: 📌 Total Workload: 34 hours
items: ✅ Live classes: 2x per week (3h each) → 24 hours
✅ Extra live classes: Mentoring and review → 10 hours
✅ Recorded classes: Complement the practical content

objective.title: 🎯 Module 1 Objective
objective.description: The objective of this module is to teach the basics of web programming, with JavaScript from day one, as well as HTML and CSS as support to develop complete projects.

strategy.title: 🔥 Learning Strategy
items: ✅ Focus on logic and JavaScript from the first class
✅ HTML and CSS as support for learning JS (not the other way around)
✅ Practical use of Git and GitHub Pages for early deployment
✅ Mini practical projects for each major concept learned

weeks.title: Week 1: Web Fundamentals and Introduction to JavaScript
items: 📌 How does the web work?
📌 Introduction to HTML, CSS and GitHub Pages
📌 Environment setup (VS Code, Node.js, Git)
📌 Creating a first static site and publishing on GitHub Pages
📌 Introduction to JavaScript: Variables, Data Types and Operators

weeks.title: Week 2: Essential JavaScript and DOM Manipulation
items: 📌 Control structures: if, else, switch
📌 Loops: for, while, do while
📌 Functions and scope
📌 DOM manipulation: querySelector, events and interactions
📌 Creating an interactive To-Do List

weeks.title: Week 3: Advanced JavaScript and Data Storage
items: 📌 Arrays and objects in JavaScript
📌 Methods map(), filter(), reduce()
📌 JSON and LocalStorage
📌 Creating a Persistent Task Manager

weeks.title: Week 4: APIs, Advanced Git and Project Publishing
items: 📌 Working with public APIs using fetch()
📌 Creating a Weather App with external API
📌 Code versioning and branches on GitHub
📌 Creating a basic portfolio to publish the projects made in the course

items: ✅ Straight to the point, clear and objective
